name: Inaccurate Death
description:
Team Name:
Sutivu Team

Look Around:  Mouse
Movement:  W S A D (or  ASERTY if you are FR, auto.)
Jump:  SpaceBar
Pause Menu: ESC
Grab: Left Mouse button
Interation: E

Pitch:
Inaccurate Death is a game about puzzle and finding how to die in differents maners. 

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission:
- Some assets from SuperGrid on the marketplace (soil material, footsteps sound, grid matérial)
- Water material from starter content
- Music "HarpOfChronos" from free content 'Sound Phenomenon Fantasy' on the marketplace
- And 1 free material form GameTextures Material pack (Concrect)
